    df1[i].plot(kind='line',figsize=(12,8),marker='o')
    plt.xlabel(" Date ")
    plt.ylabel("Number of People Vaccinated")
    plt.title(i,fontsize=18)
    plt.savefig(i,dpi=300,facecolor=None)
    plt.show()
